Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. This product holds immense value to me due to its unique features and the impact it has had on my own projects. Given its importance, I am offering you the chance to purchase it at a special introductory price of $850000.

Please consider this offer carefully, as it represents an exceptional value considering the product's capabilities and the benefits it can bring to you. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you and contributing to the success of your endeavors.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $850,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $850,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
